segments.text: ABC Rent-a-Car . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to rent a car . What kind of car do you have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have Volkswagen , Pinto , Plymouth and Datsun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Twenty dollars per day for Volkswagen , Pinto and Datsun , and twenty-seven dollars for Plymouth .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is no charge for mileage . And fill up the gas when you return the car to us as it is not included .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I'll try a Pinto . I want to rent a car for one week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , sir . May I have your driver's license ?
segments.speaker: S1
